<<<<<<< HEAD
Seauen satyres applyed to the weeke including the worlds ridiculous follyes. True fælicity described in the phoenix. Maulgre. Whereunto is annexed the wandring satyre. By W. Rankins, Gent. Rankins, William, fl. 1587.
[4], 49, [1] p.
By Edw. Allde for William Ferbrand: and are to be sould at his shop in Lothbury, at the hither end of Colman streete, Imprinted at London : 1598.
In verse. Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
